channel.title: Public Moderation Logs
channel.description:
**[color=red]DISCLAIMER: This topic contains potentially offensive content. If you do not wish to see updates to this thread, it is recommended that you set it to Muted. [/color]**
# Rules and Punishments All players are required to follow the [Global Rules](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244) as well as the [Forum Game Rules](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926).
All violations are handled on a case-by-case basis by the [Moderation Team](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/list-of-forum-staff-volunteers-ordered-alphabetically/81361). Punishments will be issued depending on the severity of the rulebreak, as well as the player's history. Types of disciplinary actions are as follows: * Warning - *not listed in Public Moderation Logs* * Mute (for certain offenses only, such as spam) - *not listed in Public Moderation Logs* * Signup blacklists * Alt blacklists * Hosting blacklists * Suspensions * Permanent Bans
--- # Forum Game Blacklists
This list is effective immediately. Additions to the blacklist will be handled by the Forum of Lies team.
|Player Name|Blacklist Type| Reason |Duration| Issued (mm/dd/yy) | Expiration (mm/dd/yy) | |---|---|---|---|---|---| |cupcakeaj2|Signup + Hosting|Excessive slanking| Indefinite | 06/02/19 | - |Margaret|Signup + Hosting|Gamethrowing| Indefinite | 06/04/19 | - | Alice| Hosting | Bypassing review system | Indefinite (appealed) | 12/03/19 | - |Napoleon| Signup|Excessive replacing out|2 months|06/30/20 | 08/30/20 | ChopChop | Signup | Quoting PMs + Deadposting | 2 weeks | 07/08/20 | 07/22/20 |Geyde|Signup|Personal Request|3 months|07/11/20 | 10/11/20 |CRichard564 | Signup | Quoting PMs | 1 month | 07/15/20 | 08/15/20 |Marshal | Signup | Personal Request| 1 month| 08/01/20 | 09/01/20 | ChopChop | Alt | Creating alts without permission | 3 months | 08/16/20 | 11/16/20 | Zone_Q11 | Signup | Gamethrowing | 3 months | 08/20/20 | 11/20/20 |Geyde|Signup|Personal Request|3 months|08/25/20 | 11/26/20 |Napoleon|Signup|Personal Request|3 months|08/30/20 | 11/30/20 |Jane|Signup|Personal Request|3 months|09/08/20 | 12/08/20 katze|Signup|Personal Request|1 month|10/03/20 | 11/03/20 Wazza|Signup|Personal Request|3 months|10/13/20 | 01/12/21 Trochilidae|Signup|Personal Request|1 month|10/26/20 | 11/26/20 SirDerpsAlot|Signup|Personal Request|1 month|11/09/20 | 12/09/20 ChopChop|Signup|Nightposting|1 month|12/03/20 | 01/03/21 Apprentice|Signup|Personal Request|Indefinite (appealed)|12/09/20 | (03/06/21) Napoleon|Signup|Personal Request|1 month|01/05/21 | 02/05/21 GGhana|Hosting|Lying to reviewers|2 months|02/19/21 | 04/19/21 Rome|Signup|Quoting rolecard / Modkill intent|3 months|02/21/21 | 05/21/21 Wazza|Signup|Personal Request|Indefinite (reduced)|02/22/21 | (04/14/21) GGhana|Signup|Personal Request|1 month|02/25/21 | 03/25/21 Hippoyeetus|Signup|Personal Request|2 months, 10 days|02/27/21 | 05/07/21 Emilia|Signup|Personal Request|Indefinite (appealed)|02/27/21 | (06/13/21) Alice|Signup|Toxicity|Indefinite (appealed)|03/07/21|(08/07/21) CRichard564|Signup|Discussing rulebreaks / Modkill intent| 4 months|03/15/21 | 07/15/21 Trochilidae|Signup|Excessive replacing out|2 months|03/17/21 | 05/17/21 Leafia|Signup|Nightposting / Contesting modkill|3 months|03/17/21 | 06/17/21 ChopChop|Signup|Modkill intent / Nightposting / Contesting modkill|6 months|03/17/21 | 09/17/21 |Dota|Signup|Gamethrowing|1 month|04/27/21|05/27/21 |CRichard564|Signup|Targetted Harassment|6 months|05/31/21|02/15/22 |Astand|Signup|Personal Request|1 year|06/27/21|6/27/22 |Solic|Signup|Personal Request|6 months|06/28/21|12/28/21 an_gorta_pratai | Signup | Unauthorized alting | 6 months | 08/14/21 | 02/14/22 an_gorta_pratai | Alt | Unauthorized alting | 3 months | 02/14/22 | 05/02/22 Marshal|Signup|Personal Request|Until June 1st|08/25/21|06/01/22 sulit | Signup | Personal Request | 2 months | 09/09/21 | 11/09/21 Indefinite Blacklists last until said player has proven they have changed and have appealed directly with any of the Moderators listed below: @Chloe @DatBird @Arete @katze
Blacklisted players may sub into forum games in the event that the game cannot be run without them - and the host gives permission.
# Suspensions (Starting Jan 2020) |Player Name| Reason |Duration| Issued (mm/dd/yy) | Expiration (mm/dd/yy) |---|---|---|---|---| w1ngz | Community Banned| Indefinite | 01/21/20 | - JakeTheWolfie | Harassment | 1 month | 02/04/20 | 03/04/20 PyreLight | Community Banned | Indefinite | 02/07/20 | - Isaac-Gonzalez | Racism | 7 days | 02/13/20 | 02/20/20 Marshal | Harassment | 7 days (appealed) | 03/05/20 | 03/12/20 (03/05/20) JakeTheWolfie | Posting Pornography | Indefinite | 03/15/20 | - MalO | Community Banned/Ban Evasion | Indefinite | 05/11/20 | - Alice | Harassment | 1 month |06/18/20 | 07/18/20 Ami | Harassment/Toxicity | 1 day |06/18/20 | 06/19/20 CRichard564 | Harassment | 1 day | 06/28/20 | 06/29/20 SmoothBrainPepega | Spam | Indefinite | 09/22/20 | - [spoiler]NateHiggers[/spoiler] | Racism | Indefinite | 10/13/20 | - Alice|Toxicity + Request|Indefinite (appealed)|10/25/20 | (03/07/21) Grahamster|Community Banned|Indefinite|12/23/20 | - RopeStringFace|Community Banned + Trolling|Indefinite|02/25/21 | - CRichard564|Harassment/Toxicity|1 month|03/15/21 | 04/15/21 |Dota|Toxicity and Inappropriate behaviour|1 week|04/20/21|04/27/21 |Zone_Q11|Personal Request|Until August 1st|05/21/21|07/10/21 |CRichard564|Targetted Harrassment|2 Months|05/31/21|7/31/21 eevee | Harassment + Threats | Indefinite (appealed) | 06/18/21 | (07/15/21) astand | Personal Request | Indefinite | 08/25/21 | -
Players banned for the reason "Community Banned" are those who have lost their community privileges after a 30d+ ban from Throne of Lies, or a ban from the ToL Discord.
Players who wish to appeal may DM a Forum Moderator on Discord. All Moderators can be found on the [Official Throne of Lies Discord](https://discord.gg/tol) at: Chloe#4965 Arete#7872 Dat Bird#8705 kat#0420
[color=tomato]Please do not discuss moderation decisions publicly, or attempt to appeal someone else's case.[/color]

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: DatBird
item.description:
@gghana has been signup blacklisted until December by request.

This is effective immediately and will expire 2021-12-01T08:00:00Z

Read full topic

This is effective immediately and will expire 2021-11-09T08:00:00Z

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
@Wazza has been suspended for 3 months after repeatedly breaking Rules 1 and 2 of the Global Rules.

This will expire on December 2nd, 2021.
Do not attempt to appeal for this user.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
@astand has been permanently banned by request.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
@Marshal has been sign-up blacklisted until June 1st by personal request.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
@an_gorta_pratai has been signup blacklisted for 6 months after creating a secondary account without moderator authorization in an attempt to join a game (VLDR 3) that he is not permitted to play.
The alt, @TheSilentNinja6431, has been banned indefinitely.

Additionally, when this blacklist expires, this user will be blacklisted from creating alt accounts for 3 months.

This signup blacklist will expire February 14th, 2022
This alt blacklist will expire May 14th, 2022

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
@Alice has been unblacklisted from FM and Misc games after an approved appeal.

This is effective immediately.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
@eevee has been unbanned after an approved appeal.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs

item.description:
@Solic has been signup blacklisted for 6 months by request
This is effective immediately and will expire 2021-12-28T17:00:00Z

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
@astand has been signup blacklisted for one year by request.

This is effective immediately and will expire 2022-06-27T07:00:00Z

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
Harassment and threats are never acceptable, and are a violation of the Global Forum Rules. These behaviors will not be tolerated, regardless of the target. In particular, we have received reports that some users are harassing and threatening eevee; this behavior will be treated as seriously as harassing and threatening any other forum user.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
@eevee and all of his secondary accounts have been permanently banned for continued threats, harassment, and multiple instances of disrespect. This behavior is not, and will never be, tolerated.

Do not attempt to appeal for this user.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
@Emilia has been unblacklisted after an approved appeal.

This is effective immediately

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: DatBird
item.description:
@CRichard564 has been suspended for 2 months after breaking Rule [2] of the Global Rules.

Additionally, when this ban expires, this user will be sign-up blacklisted for 6 months for this being a repeated offense. Since they had time left on his current blacklist, that will carry over. They will also be unable to backup/replace-in for any games during this time.

Thus this ban will expire on July 31st, 2021, and this blacklist will expire February 15th, 2022.
Do not attempt to appeal for this user.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
@Zone_Q11 has been suspended until July 10th by personal request.

The suspension was reduced from August 1st to July 10th by request

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
@an_gorta_pratai has been sign-up blacklisted for one month due to excessive slanking after previous warnings.

This blacklist is effective immediately and will expire on June 9, 2021.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
@Wazza has been suspended for 1 month after breaking Rules [1&2] of the Global Rules.

This will expire on May 25th, 2021.
Do not attempt to appeal for this user.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: DatBird
item.description:
@dota has been suspended for 1 week after breaking Rules [1&2] of the Global Rules.

Additionally, when this ban expires, this user will be sign-up blacklisted for 1 month for gamethrowing.

This ban will expire on April 27th, 2021, and this blacklist will expire May 27th, 2021.
Do not attempt to appeal for this user.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
@Trochilidae has been signup blacklisted for 2 months due to excessive replacing out of games in a short period of time.

This blacklist is effective immediately and will expire May 17th, 2021

@Leafia has been signup blacklisted for 3 months after intentionally posting during night to contest a modkill.

This blacklist is effective immediately and will expire June 17th, 2021

@ChopChop has been signup blacklisted for 6 months after expressing intent to post their rolecard in an attempt to get modkilled, as well as intentionally posting during night to contest a modkill.

This blacklist is effective immediately and will expire September 17th, 2021

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
@CRichard564 has been suspended for 1 month after breaking Rule [2] of the Global Rules.

Additionally, when this ban expires, this user will be sign-up blacklisted for 3 months for discussing intent to break the rules, and using this to gain an advantage.

This ban will expire on April 15th, 2021, and this blacklist will expire July 15th, 2021.
Do not attempt to appeal for this user.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
@Alice has been unbanned after an approved appeal. As a condition of this appeal, she may host games, but may not participate in FM/Misc games.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs

@Apprentice has been unblacklisted after an approved appeal.

This unblacklist is effective immediately.

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
@Wazza’s blacklist has been reduced after an approved appeal, and will be shortened to 2-months (starting from their last replace out) after multiple instances of replacing out in a short time period.

This will expire on April 14th, 2021.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
@Emilia has been sign-up blacklisted permanently by request.

This blacklist is effective immediately and will expire only upon an approved appeal.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Moderation Logs
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
@Hippolytus has been sign-up blacklisted for the next two months and 10 days by personal request.

This blacklist is effective immediately and will expire on May 7th, 2021.
